description.value:
While others of your kin may be powerful wizards and sorcerers, the eldritch nature of the blood coursing through your veins transforms you into a spell-breaking terror.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.QaMwiDFQdDwycTUO]{Disruptive}*
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Iron Will}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Power Attack}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{Quick Draw}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.yE3hVOvBq9rx6TAw]{Spellbreaker}*.

(Your bloodrager levels count as fighter levels for the purposes of qualifying for any feats marked with an asterisk [*].) This stacks with any levels in fighter you have.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.49yc9dpr4kvgki2s]{Magic Missile} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{Invisibility} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m84969gni5iu4bdt]{Lightning Bolt} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{Dimension Door} (16th)
